comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: Number of small butcher shops to build
- y: Number of large butcher shops to build

Definitions:
- Objective function: Minimize Z = x + y
- Constraints:
  - 30x + 70y \geq 500 (at least 500 hot dogs per day)
  - 2x + 4y \leq 30 (limited number of workers available)
